tool_description: The Explicit Content Detection API is a powerful tool designed to analyze text and identify potentially Not Safe For Work (NSFW) content. With state-of-the-art natural language processing algorithms, this API scans text inputs to determine the presence of explicit or inappropriate language, ensuring a safer and more user-friendly online environment.
name: NSFW Text Detection
title: NSFW Text Detection

api_list.name: NSFW
api_list.description: Check if the text is NSW friendly
